name: Pluck- charming puzzles
description:
Pluck- charming puzzles offers cute and fun puzzles for everyone.game is Procedurally Generated so you can play as many as levels you want and as long as you want .you will never run out of content.

Features Of The Game:

-Procedurally Generated puzzles so you can play as long as you want
-colorful and beautiful puzzles.
-short and bit sized levels so u never get bored.
-simple one touch easy mechanic

How To Play The Game:

simply tap on the object you want to pull apart to clear the puzzles and don't tap on the empty area .
